description: This Java class, BankAccountMapper, extends a generic BaseMapper to convert between BankAccountEntity and BankAccount DTO objects, utilizing Spring's BeanUtils for property copying.

classes.name: BankAccountMapper
classes.description: A mapper class that converts between BankAccountEntity and BankAccount DTO objects.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a BankAccount DTO to a BankAccountEntity, copying properties and excluding 'user'.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a BankAccountEntity to a BankAccount DTO, copying properties and excluding 'user'.
